name: Memory Zone Meme "Shell of Faded Rage" (Bug)
description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The reference entity is imbued with specific cognition, formed by the accumulation of subconscious fragments in the Memory Zone.
Memories of anguish burn like flames, scorching the heart. When the suffering fades away, the life born from resentment will rise from the ashes, accumulating boundless fury.

skills.name: Grudging Courtesy
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to one designated target and gain 1 "Scorchbone Inferno" stack.

skills.name: Tide of Enduring Grudges
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to all targets and gain 1 "Scorchbone Inferno" stack.

skills.name: Bonepiercing Odium
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG continuously to one random target and their adjacent targets. Each "Scorchbone Inferno" stack deals 1 additional instance of damage.

skills.name: Disembodied Shell
skills.description: Enters the "Safeguard" state. While not Weakness Broken, reduces DMG received. Once Weakness is Broken, action will be delayed. After Weakness is Broken, increases DMG received.
